description: The Green With Envy cocktail is a reviving drink that will keep you cool and energized during the&nbsp;holiday season. It has all the necessary green ingredients from cucumber, arugula, and green chartreuse liqueur.Plus, the earthy and citrusy taste of&nbsp;gin complements all the flavors perfect for your Irish holiday celebration! After a long day at work, this drink is sure to calm you with its light taste and easy-to-make recipe.
name: Green With Envy
